tldr: Affected versions of `@contentstack/utils` are vulnerable to HTML injection in attribute keys and values. An attacker can inject malicious HTML, potentially leading to unintended behavior or further exploitation, depending on how the injected content is processed.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you use a vulnerable version of `craft-retour`.
vulnerable_to: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags
